actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to amend the Agricultural Act of 1970 for the purpose of authorizing the Secretary of Agriculture to include hay as a disaster reserve; and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Agricultural Act of 1970 to authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to acquire hay for inclusion in the separate reserve established for the alleviation of distress caused by natural disasters.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Agricultural Act of 1970 for the purpose of authorizing the Secretary of Agriculture to include hay as a disaster reserve; and for other purposes.
